content: why not treat baby to a well-fitting tailored garment for a change the top has real custom set-in sleeves the skirt is designed to mimic pleating break out the cheerleading pompoms baby make something for baby that will rival even the large department store chains you ll have a quality garment made yourself that fits better looks better and will last longer pattern sizes are 6 months 9 months 12 months 18 months and 24 months >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version this is a republish of a pattern with original publish date in 2006
